Class GComponent

java.lang.Object
  guicomponents.GComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable, processing.core.PConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
GButton, GCheckbox, GLabel, GOption, GPanel, GSlider, GTextField
public class GComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements processing.core.PConstants, java.lang.Comparable

The base class for all GUI components

Author:
Peter Lager

isOver

public boolean isOver(int ax,
                      int ay)
Determines whether the position ax, ay is over this component. This is the default implementation and assumes the component is a rectangle where x & y is the top-left corner and the size is defined by width and height. Override this method where necessary in child classes e.g. GPanel

Parameters:
ax - mouse x position
ay - mouse y position
Returns:
true if mouse is over the component else false

calcAbsPosition

public void calcAbsPosition(java.awt.Point d)
This method will calculate the absolute top left position of this component taking into account any ancestors.
